title: Empowering Learning for Everyone
text: This tool is designed to assist individuals with dyslexia and ADHD by providing an intuitive and accessible learning experience.

section.title: Why Generative AI?
section.content: Generative AI enables personalized learning experiences, adapting to individual needs and preferences.

section.title: Why Accessibility Matters?
section.content: Our tool focuses on accessibility to ensure that everyone, regardless of their challenges, can learn effectively.
